vortex.textbox

Class BasicDialogbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • vortex.GameEntity
      • vortex.Textbox
        • vortex.textbox.BasicDialogbox

  • public class BasicDialogbox
extends Textbox
    A Textbox specifically designed to handle dialog.
    Author:
    Daniel Stumpff

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int curDrawnChars
      Controls how many chars to draw for the current line.

      protected boolean finishedDialog
